import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react'; function Landing() { const [movie,setMovie]=useState('') const [count,setCount]=useState(0) async function getRec(req,res){ const fetche_rec= await axios.get('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie', { params: { api_key:"f4a00265d0b6421a5949e48531d923f8",language:"en-US",include_adult:false, include_video:false,page:1,with_genres:"35",page:3} }); setMovie(fetche_rec.data.results[count]) setCount(count+1); } async function addMovie(){ axios.post("http://localhost:8000/my-list").then(res=>res.console.log("hi")) } return ( <> {/*

Lets get a comedy movie

{count==0 ?: } {count<=20?

{movie.title}

Add to list
:null} */}

Let's find you a movie! Do you have a genre in mind?

) } export default Landing
